MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW8, CW9 WA6 postcode areas of Northwich Warrington and Frodsham.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  4:05AM.  Our engineers are currently working to replace a snapped pole and grounded overhead lines. In order to complete repairs, engineers on site will need to isolate the power to other properties at 4PM and we expect the power to be restored by 6PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.56PM on 16th November 2020
